poem.title: Earless in Tara
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: The Flight of the Earls When each took fright Abandoning churls To their fate and the pap Of the taters. The Oils (Had they landed in Brooklyn) became "Les huiles", big wheels, With their buckets of emerald. To each his heiress. Hers An ell of linen, his AN L-plate sporran.
